name: Trix Editor With Mentions
plugin_instructions:
Setup in the Plugin Editor
Exposed Fields:

Add the following fields to the "Fields" section of the plugin editor:

data (Type: List, Data Type: Your desired data type).
This will be the source for the user list.

content_type (Type: List, Data Type: Your desired data type)
Do search for command for adding data.

name_field (Type: Text).
Name of the field in your data source representing usernames.

image_field (Type: Text).
Name of the field in your data source representing user profile pictures.


Exposed States:

Add the following state to the "Exposed States" section:
mentioned_users (Type: List, Data Type: Your desired data type).
This will store the list of IDs for users mentioned in the input.
